Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-MemberRoleType

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _MemberRoleType

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _MemberRoleTypeMemberRoleTypeTypes of membership for Role code "MBR"

name: MemberRoleType
title: MemberRoleType
description: A role type that is used to further qualify an entity playing a role where the role class attribute is set to RoleClassMember.
